forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts a gentle glow upon Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with clarity and warmth. With temperatures gliding toward 64 degrees, the skies present an inviting azure, unmarred by the typical coastal fog. A light west wind brushes through the city, adding a refreshing touch as it carries the faint scent of the bay. The horizon reveals the Golden Gate Bridge standing proud against the shimmering waters, a testament to the splendid beauty of this vibrant locale.

As night approaches, the sky will retain its clear disposition, settling into a comfortable low of 51 degrees. A southwest breeze will continue its soft whispers, offering a sense of calm as the city transitions from day to evening. This pleasant weather invites a leisurely stroll through the streets or perhaps a relaxed gathering at an outdoor café, where one can indulge in conversation under the twinkling city lights. Dress in layers to embrace the coolness of the night while enjoying the lingering warmth of the day, and seize this opportunity to appreciate the casual beauty of San Francisco on this splendid afternoon.
